players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob seems suspicious, I don't know why but he does."
You: "Bob is lying, I don't trust him."
Bob: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Trust me, I have a reason."
Charlie: "Bob is lying, I believe him to be the Mafioso. We should lynch him."
